properties.name: Mudflat Studio
properties.notes: Community ceramics studio offering classes for all levels, open studio time, and member artists. One of the oldest pottery studios in the Boston area.

properties.name: The Clay School
properties.notes: Community ceramics studio in Cambridge offering wheel throwing, hand building, and glaze classes for all skill levels.

properties.name: Cambridge Center for Adult Education
properties.notes: Long-running adult education center in Harvard Square offering ceramics and pottery classes alongside other arts courses.

properties.name: Artisan's Asylum
properties.notes: Large maker community space with a dedicated ceramics studio. Offers classes and open studio membership.

properties.name: Society of Arts and Crafts
properties.notes: America's oldest nonprofit craft organization. Gallery and shop selling handmade ceramics and other fine crafts by juried artists.

properties.name: MassArt Continuing Education
properties.notes: Massachusetts College of Art and Design continuing education program offering ceramics and sculpture classes to the public.

properties.name: Arlington Center for the Arts
properties.notes: Community arts center offering ceramics classes for adults and youth in Arlington.

properties.name: New Art Center
properties.notes: Community arts center in Newton offering wheel throwing, hand building, and raku ceramics classes and studio membership.

properties.name: Brookline Arts Center
properties.notes: Community arts center offering pottery and ceramics classes for adults and children in Brookline.

properties.name: North Shore Art Center
properties.notes: Arts center on the North Shore offering pottery and ceramics classes alongside fine arts instruction.

properties.name: Montserrat College of Art
properties.notes: Visual arts college offering community ceramics courses through its continuing education program.

properties.name: South Shore Art Center
properties.notes: Established arts center offering ceramics and pottery classes, open studio time, and gallery exhibitions.

properties.name: Danforth Art Museum School
properties.notes: Art school and museum offering ceramics and pottery classes for adults and children in Framingham.

properties.name: The Pottery Studio
properties.notes: Community pottery studio in Concord offering wheel and hand building classes and open studio membership.

properties.name: Worcester Center for Crafts
properties.notes: One of the largest craft schools in New England. Offers extensive ceramics programming, open studio, and resident artist studios.

properties.name: Northampton Center for the Arts
properties.notes: Arts center in downtown Northampton with ceramics studio space and classes in the Pioneer Valley.

properties.name: Digging Dog Pottery
properties.notes: Working pottery studio in Shelburne Falls offering classes and open studio. Beautiful rural setting in the Pioneer Valley.

properties.name: Studio 550
properties.notes: Regional ceramics studio just over the NH border. Included as a resource for potters in northern MA. Classes, open studio, and member space.
